speaker: BARDOLPH
text: Sir, the Germans desire to have three of

speaker: BARDOLPH
text: your horses. The Duke himself will be tomorrow at

speaker: BARDOLPH
text: court, and they are going to meet him.

speaker: HOST
text: What duke should that be comes so secretly? I

speaker: HOST
text: hear not of him in the court. Let me speak with the

speaker: BARDOLPH
text: Ay, sir. I’ll call them to you.

speaker: HOST
text: They shall have my horses, but I’ll make them

speaker: HOST
text: pay. I’ll sauce them. They have had my house a

speaker: HOST
text: week at command; I have turned away my other

speaker: HOST
text: guests. They must come off. I’ll sauce them. Come.
